name: FloatWeb | Building tomorrow's web. today
description: A web development agency that specializes in creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites for businesses and individuals.

name: Armor HUD
description: Minecraft mod that displays the durability of your armor on your screen. To the left of your offhand slot, you will see the durability of your helmet, chestplate, leggings, and boots.

name: Elytra Swapper
description: A Minecraft mod that uses a keybind to swap chestplate and elytra for quick switching between flight and defense.

description: A web scraper that scrapes specific game information from multiple websites, perfectly validated to ensure the information is correct and up-to-date.

description: My Personal Portfolio for all my projects, work and skills. - Still in development.

name: Real-time Facial and Hand Landmark Detection
description: A real-time Python application for detecting facial and hand landmarks using OpenCV and Mediapipe.

name: Badges
description: A Minecraft plugin for the Folia server platform that integrates with Towny to add badges to players for various achievements and statuses, such as having premium, being a donator, or being a staff member.

name: SkillPass
description: A Minecraft plugin for the Folia server platform that adds a full in-game quest system with custom rewards and GUI. Players can complete quests to earn rewards and progress through different skill levels.
